scotland_3_questions.description: Three-question format used by NHS Scotland trusts

questions.text: Why do you think you are suitable for this role? (Describe how your skills, knowledge and experience match the person specification, while also explaining your motivation and goals.)
Why do you want to work for the NHS? (think about the NHS and or Board Values)
Is there any other relevant information that will assist us in shortlisting your application (if none, please state)
